artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Tsutaya Kichizō
catalogue_raissonne: Ukiyo-e shūka 14 (1981), Hiroshige list, p. 252, ōban #24.07
description: landscape view with figures walking on a road; two trees in foreground center, with other trees beyond road and in middle ground at right edge; small cluster of thatch-roofed buildings in center; mountain peak at left in distance; from an accordion-folded album with black soft cover
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Famous Sights of the Fifty-Three Stations (Gojūsan tsugi meisho zue 五十三次名所圖會), also known as the Vertical Tōkaidō (Tate Tōkaidō)
title: 7, Fujisawa
